Item.name: Armored Trench Coat
Item.description: A trench coat with a ballistic vest hidden underneath, popular among mercenaries with a fashion sense or a need for subtlety.

Item.name: Tuxedo
Item.description: Nice formal wear for a more stylish submariner.

Item.name: Enkephalin
Item.description: Enkephalin was the energy resource which Lobotomy Corporation produced. It was extracted from the Abnormalities created through its Singularity, which produced Enkephalin when their needs were met. Enkephalin is often stored in PE-boxes, and is considered an efficient and eco-friendly resource, making it popular with both other Corps and Europan denizens even after the Collapse of L Corp.

Item.name: Enkephalin Box
Item.description: A stable container storing liquid Enkephalin. A label reads: [CAUTION] Handling this box without following the prescribed procedures may result in accidents such as Enkephalin leakage. Unregulated ingestion of Enkephalin may cause a wide range of unverified psychopathological symptoms.

Item.name: Enkephalin Module
Item.description: A module containing Enkephalin, an organic byproduct unique to Abnormalities. A label on the module reads: [NOTE] Utilizing a dosage of liquid Enkephalin allows for more stable usage compared to its gaseous form. The Enkephalin can be converted into energy by plugging the module into a designated socket. [CAUTION] Modularization of Enkephalin is an irreversible; the module may only be expended via a socket. Usage outside of intended purposes or modification is strictly forbidden.

Item.name: Overcharged Enkephalin Module
Item.description: An overcharged Enkephalin module containing much more energy than its standard version. Outputs the same level of heat as a Fulgurium fuel rod.

Item.name: Empty Enkephalin Module
Item.description: An empty Enkephalin module that can be safely deconstructed.

Item.name: Guide to ALEPH-Grade Abnormalities
Item.description: A guide to Abnormalities of the ALEPH Grade.

Item.name: Physical Shield Bullet
Item.description: A gel bullet that fits in revolvers and rifles which, when fired at an ally, will grant them a shield against physical damage.

Item.name: Mental Shield Bullet
Item.description: A bullet that fits in revolvers and rifles which, when fired at an ally, will grant them a shield against psychological damage.

Item.name: Infection Shield Bullet
Item.description: A bullet that fits in revolvers and rifles which, when fired at an ally, will grant them a shield against infections.

Item.name: PALE Shield Bullet
Item.description: A bullet that fits in revolvers and rifles which, when fired at an ally, will grant them a shield against special damage caused by Abnormalities.

Item.name: Degraded Arbiter's Cloak
Item.description: 'I know you well, even though you know nothing about me.' This cloak can generate degraded Arbiter spells at the cost of Enkephalin Modules.

Item.name: Degraded Chain
Item.description: An Arbiter spell that temporarily binds a target.

Item.name: Bound Hands
Item.description: Your hands are bound by magic.

Item.name: Degraded Fairy
Item.description: Fairy is the Singularity of F Corp, and is able to 'unlock' anything. In this case, it unlocks the enemy's flesh.

Item.name: Degraded Pillar
Item.description: Fires off a large pillar capable of piercing through everything in its path, quite devastating against armored or large targets.

Item.name: Degraded Shockwave
Item.description: Shockwave is considered the most powerful Arbiter ability, able to wipe out vast swathes of enemies in one go and devastate landscapes. This, however, is a much weaker version of that. Fortunately, it protects you against its own effects. WARNING: This ignores walls and has a maximum radius of 5 meters!

Item.name: True Arbiter's Cloak
Item.description: 'There will be no obstacle you cannot overcome.'

Item.name: Fairy Beam
Item.description: A beam of Fairy energy which will 'unlock', aka cut through doors, structures, living things, anything in the Arbiter's path.

Item.name: Lock Beam
Item.description: The Singularity of J Corp allows for anything to be 'locked' and inaccessible. In this case it is used to mend structures and people, and even extinguish flames.

Item.name: True Chain
Item.description: Using the Lock Singularity, an Arbiter can bind a hapless target in place.

Item.name: True Fairy
Item.description: The true power of Fairy is to unlock anything, including your enemy's flesh. This quick-firing spell deals equal damage to all enemies and is therefore best used against powerful foes.

Item.name: True Pillar
Item.description: This energetic pillar can punch straight through any defense and decimate anything in its path. Use carefully.

Item.name: True Shockwave
Item.description: The true power of the Garion-style Shockwave. WARNING: VERY DANGEROUS!

Item.name: Cataclysmic Shockwave
Item.description: The fully unleashed power of an Arbiter, capable of wiping an entire outpost off the map.

Item.name: E.G.O. Stabilizer
Item.description: A haloperidol syringe charged with Enkephalin to strengthen one's E.G.O. and keep them safe from mental harm.

Item.name: E.G.O. Destabilizer
Item.description: A haloperidol syringe charged with Enkephalin to weaken one's E.G.O. and render them more susceptible to mental harm.

Item.name: Liu Association Uniform
Item.description: The Liu Association specializes in direct combat and warfare, preferring to use flames as their weapon of choice. Their uniform protects excellently against flames, preventing you from burning yourself when you play with fire.

Item.name: Liu Association Coat
Item.description: The Liu Association specializes in direct combat and warfare, preferring to use flames as their weapon of choice. This coat is made with a tough ballistic weave that reduces the wearer's mobility but provides ample protection to the upper body.

Item.name: Liu Association Sword
Item.description: A standard issue blade of Liu Association South Sections 1 and 2. It's capable of setting enemies on fire, so regardless of its actual potency it's got a significant psychological warfare factor. It's lightweight and can be swung rather quickly.

Item.name: Xiao's Guandao (Replica)
Item.description: A convincing replica of the guandao that belongs to Xiao, the Director of Liu Association South Section 1. Even a fraction of the original's power makes for a truly potent weapon indeed. Inflicts significant burns.

Item.name: Thumb Soldato Uniform
Item.description: The Thumb makes up one of the five Fingers, massive syndicates with power rivalling national governments. The Thumb's Soldatos specialize in ranged warfare, so their uniforms can't get in the way of firearm operation.

Item.name: Thumb Soldato Coat
Item.description: This jacket is well built for melee and ranged combat alike, its light weight improves the user's ability to maneuver and utilize weapons.

Item.name: Thumb Soldato Hat
Item.description: A hat which conceals some armoring which provides substantial protection for the top of the head. The brim of the hat ensures no light from ceiling-mounted lamps distracts the user, and there is no visor to obstruct vision, improving weapon proficiency.

Item.name: Thumb Capo Uniform
Item.description: Capo, or Captain, is the rank above Soldato. Any given Capo is roughly equivalent to a Grade 1-2 Fixer in terms of combat capabilities and commands their own small army of Soldatos. This is their usual attire.

Item.name: Thumb Capo Coat
Item.description: So-called 'combat coats' with ballistic weave infused with Enkephalin are quite popular among Fixers, as they are bulletproof and can cover the entire torso. The Thumb is especially well known for having no shortage of them.

Item.name: Capo Pistol
Item.description: An antique-looking manually operated pistol. It looks like a fossil, but you'd be surprised what it can do. Its variable chamber and internal magazine allows it to load various kinds of single-shot ammo with a max capacity of 6. A mainstay of the Thumb's upper echelons and a symbol of authority.

Item.name: Lei Heng's Uniform
Item.description: Lei Heng's rank currently stands as Capo IIII of the Thumb's Eastern branch.

Item.name: Lei Heng's Coat
Item.description: Not only is he a member of the Thumb, but Lei Heng is also the Tiantiu Star of the Pinky. He's one of the few known individuals to be part of two Fingers simultaneously, although it's unclear if the Thumb itself knows this.

Item.name: Lei Heng's Hair
Item.description: A convincing wig that copies Lei Heng's iconic heirstyle. (Also magically grants immunity to Oxygen Low.)

Item.name: Tiantui Star Blade
Item.description: A legendary weapon developed for the Tiantui Star. It utilizes Propellant Ammo to hit like a truck, but beware, it can be difficult to handle - it'll fly right out of the hands of inexperienced users.

Item.name: Soldato's Bayonet Spear
Item.description: Some sub-factions of the Thumb use propellant ammunition to accelerate melee weapons instead of dealing ranged damage. It's deadly, but well, you can only carry so much ammo, and without that ammo it's pretty unwieldy.

Item.name: Soldato's Bayonet Spear: Melee Attack
Item.description: Replace this with Propellant Ammo to use empowered attacks. Feel free to drop this on the ground, it will disappear harmlessly.

Item.name: Propellant Bullet (Standard)
Item.description: A special type of ammo which trades out the projectile for an increased powder load. It's necessary for some Thumb-designed melee weapons to function, but it'll also load into rifles and fire a very short ranged blast if needed.

Item.name: Propellant Bullet Speedloader (Standard)
Item.description: A pre-loaded cylinder that contains six rounds of its respective ammunition type. Functions more or less as a magazine for Soldato Bayonet Rifles and a certain blade.

Item.name: Propellant Bullet (Tigermark)
Item.description: A Propellant Bullet with exceptional powder load, capable of hitting harder than its standard counterpart. The heat generated by this round also burns the target.

Item.name: Propellant Bullet Speedloader (Tigermark)
Item.description: A pre-loaded cylinder that contains six rounds of its respective ammunition type. Functions more or less as a magazine for Soldato Bayonet Rifles and a certain blade.

Item.name: Propellant Bullet (Savage Tigermark)
Item.description: A Propellant Bullet with an Incendium powder load, allowing it to heat up bayonet spears and burn the target.

Item.name: Propellant Bullet Speedloader (Savage Tigermark)
Item.description: A pre-loaded cylinder that contains six rounds of its respective ammunition type. Functions more or less as a magazine for Soldato Bayonet Rifles and a certain blade.

Item.name: Soldato's Rifle (Ranged Mode)
Item.description: A rifle produced by the Thumb Syndicate to arm its frontline troops. The rifle is mostly conventional, aside from its ability to field elemental ammunition produced with the power of Enkephalin. WARNING: Swapping the weapon to melee mode will eject any ammunition inside!

Item.name: Soldato's Rifle (Melee Mode)
Item.description: When the Soldatos of the Thumb Syndicate run out of ammo, they are known to turn their rifles into improvised melee weapons.

Item.name: Soldato Flame Ammunition
Item.description: An incendiary round produced by the Thumb Syndicate. Its payload cauterizes any wounds it causes almost immediately, and therefore cannot cause significant bleeding.

Item.name: Soldato Freeze Ammunition
Item.description: A cryogenic round produced by the Thumb Syndicate. Its frigid payload can cause muscle paralysis.

Item.name: Soldato Armor Piercing Ammunition
Item.description: A powerful bullet that pierces armor very well and can pierce through a door or wall to hit its target.

Item.name: Discipline
Item.description: These Enkephalin-infused brass knuckles are commonly wielded by members of the Thumb Syndicate for use as backup weapons.

Item.name: Middle Little Sibling Uniform
Item.description: Standard outfit for Little Siblings of the Middle Syndicate. It might not seem very protective, but Enkephalin-empowered fibers are surprisingly durable. You still might want to wear armor to a gunfight.

Item.name: Young Brother Werner's Uniform
Item.description: The rank of Young Brother seems to be a stepping stone between Little Brother and Big Brother within the Middle.

Item.name: Young Brother Werner's Coat
Item.description: So-called 'combat coats' with ballistic weave infused with Enkephalin are quite popular among Fixers, as they are bulletproof and can cover the entire torso. Though the Middle's rank and file seldom wear them, high ranking members can have very luxurious fur coats.

Item.name: Ricardo's Uniform
Item.description: A very luscious outfit.

Item.name: Ricardo's Coat
Item.description: MY HAIR COUPONS!!!

Item.name: Chains of the Middle (Left)
Item.description: Members of the Middle Syndicate prefer heavy chains for melee combat. These chains are too heavy for most people to wield efficiently, but an enhanced member of the Middle Syndicate can hit like a hammerhead with these.

Item.name: Chains of the Middle (Right)
Item.description: Members of the Middle Syndicate prefer heavy chains for melee combat. These chains are too heavy for most people to wield efficiently, but an enhanced member of the Middle Syndicate can hit like a hammerhead with these.

Item.name: Physicorium Chains of the Middle (Left)
Item.description: Members of the Middle Syndicate prefer heavy chains for melee combat. Using Physicorium around a dense lead interior gives these chains both weight and durability, allowing for powerful blows.

Item.name: Physicorium Chains of the Middle (Right)
Item.description: Members of the Middle Syndicate prefer heavy chains for melee combat. Using Physicorium around a dense lead interior gives these chains both weight and durability, allowing for powerful blows.

Item.name: Matthias's Uniform
Item.description: A very vengeful outfit.

Item.name: Matthias's Coat
Item.description: Somehow the most well-adjusted member of this entire Syndicate.

Item.name: Matthias's Greatsword [Form 0]
Item.description: A huge two-handed blade. Its incredible heft makes it slow to use, but a proper hit will deal massive damage and disorient any target.

Item.name: Matthias's Greatsword [Form 1]
Item.description: A huge two-handed blade. Its incredible heft makes it slow to use, but a proper hit will deal massive damage and disorient any target.

Item.name: Matthias's Greatsword [Form 2]
Item.description: A huge two-handed blade. Its incredible heft makes it slow to use, but a proper hit will deal massive damage and disorient any target.

Item.name: Matthias's Greatsword [Form 3]
Item.description: A huge two-handed blade. Its incredible heft makes it slow to use, but a proper hit will deal massive damage and disorient any target.

Item.name: Job Application
Item.description: the horrors

Item.name: Electronic Devil Maker
Item.description: A guitar which is tuned to play music unique to the Middle Syndicate.

Item.name: Cosmetic Middle Tattoos (1)
Item.description: The Middle Syndicate grants specialized enhancement tattoos to their members based on their accomplishments.

Item.name: Cosmetic Middle Tattoos (2)
Item.description: The Middle Syndicate grants specialized enhancement tattoos to their members based on their accomplishments.

Item.name: Cosmetic Middle Tattoos (3)
Item.description: The Middle Syndicate grants specialized enhancement tattoos to their members based on their accomplishments.

Item.name: Senior Middle Tattoos (1)
Item.description: The Middle Syndicate grants specialized enhancement tattoos to their members based on their accomplishments. This example is further empowered with a greater effect and the ability to slot a second gene. Typically only afforded to those who can buy it or earn it from the Middle Syndicate through hard work.

Item.name: Senior Middle Tattoos (2)
Item.description: The Middle Syndicate grants specialized enhancement tattoos to their members based on their accomplishments. This example is further empowered with a greater effect and the ability to slot a second gene. Typically only afforded to those who can buy it or earn it from the Middle Syndicate through hard work.

Item.name: Senior Middle Tattoos (3)
Item.description: The Middle Syndicate grants specialized enhancement tattoos to their members based on their accomplishments. This example is further empowered with a greater effect and the ability to slot a second gene. Typically only afforded to those who can buy it or earn it from the Middle Syndicate through hard work.

Item.name: Senior Middle Tattoos (Retreat)
Item.description: The Middle Syndicate grants specialized enhancement tattoos to their members based on their accomplishments. This example is further empowered with a greater effect and the ability to slot a second gene. Typically only afforded to those who can buy it or earn it from the Middle Syndicate through hard work.

Item.name: Ring Pointillist Student Uniform
Item.description: The Ring Syndicate values art above all else, even to the point where they believe combat should contain art. This uniform protects the wearer from getting messy in melee combat and offers a full range of motion with no restrictions.

sprite.name: Ring Pointillist Student Right Lower Arm
Ring Pointillist Student Left Lower Arm
Ring Pointillist Student Right Upper Arm
Ring Pointillist Student Left Upper Arm

Item.name: Ring Pointillist Student Apron
Item.description: Constructed of a ballistic weave enhanced by Enkephalin, this apron protects agaist bullets just as much as it protects against stains.

Item.name: Ring Pointillist Student Cap
Item.description: A large artist's cap that conceals some armoring which provides substantial protection for the top of the head, preventing concussions.

Item.name: Ring Pointillist Student Paintbrush
Item.description: A paintbrush infused with Enkephalin, capable of inflicting a wide variety of random status effects.

Item.name: Nail Gun
Item.description: An antiquated tool which predated the use of standalone welding tools. Though it remains effective, welding tools surpass it in almost every way.

Item.name: Nail
Item.description: A thin piece of iron used to bind soft materials together.

Item.name: Long Nail (Impaling)
Item.description: An exceptionally long nail intended for use as a weapon.

Item.name: Long Nail (Slashing)
Item.description: An exceptionally long nail intended for use as a weapon.

Item.name: Long Nail (Throwing)
Item.description: A long nail which can be thrown.

Item.name: Kromer's Nail (Impaling)
Item.description: An exceptionally long nail wielded by the One who Grips. It is well known for its rapid stabbing strikes.

Item.name: Kromer's Nail (Slashing)
Item.description: An exceptionally long nail wielded by the One who Grips. Despite looking like a nail, it is very functionally similar to a longsword.

Item.name: Kromer's Nail (Throwing)
Item.description: A long nail which can be thrown. This is the One who Grips' signature skill, one which catches most off surprise and is often fatal.

Item.name: Rusty Nail
Item.description: Rusty nails, made brittle by the elements, are useless for construction and deal little physical damage. You should avoid getting stabbed by one.

Item.name: N Corp Nailgun
Item.description: A compact nailgun, not terribly dangerous on its own but it can supplement hammers quite well.

Item.name: N Corp Nailgun Magazine
Item.description: A magazine for the nailgun. Holds 30 nails.

Item.name: N Corp Kleinhammer
Item.description: A small hammer used by N Corp's units of the same name.

Item.name: N Corp Mittelhammer I
Item.description: A large, heavy sledgehammer used by N Corp's units of the same name.

Item.name: N Corp Mittelhammer II
Item.description: A massive sledgehammer used by N Corp's units of the same name. Though this weapon is slow, its blows are devastating.

Item.name: N Corp Großhammer's Nail
Item.description: A big lance with fantastic reach and a heavy hit to match.

Item.name: Großhammer's Gauntlet
Item.description: The Groshammer's Gauntlet.

Item.name: Rosespanner (Repair Mode)
Item.description: An oversized metal wrench. One end functions as a normal wrench, while the other is an electric chainsaw and screwdriver combination. Its heft is best managed by well-built mechanics. In Repair Mode, it functions as a multitool. Striking an enemy with a battery inserted will burst Tremor.

Item.name: Rosespanner (Chainsaw Mode)
Item.description: An oversized metal wrench. In Saw Mode it becomes a dangerous weapon and applies Tremor, but requires a battery to function. It can cut through walls and doors with ease, with a fulgurium battery it can shred monster armor too.

Item.name: Hellspanner Spawner
Item.description: An oversized metal wrench.

Item.name: Hellspanner Spawner
Item.description: An oversized metal wrench.

Item.name: Kromer's Coat
Item.description: The ideal attire for dreamers of human wholeness.

Item.name: Cosmetically Hidden Helmet Tier I
Item.description: This helmet is conveniently invisible, and useful for fashion with function.

Item.name: Cosmetically Hidden Helmet Tier II
Item.description: This helmet is conveniently invisible, and useful for fashion with function.

Item.name: Cosmetically Hidden Helmet Tier III
Item.description: This helmet is conveniently invisible, and useful for fashion with function.

Item.name: Fanatic Booster
Item.description: Expands the subject's sensory awareness, improving their ability to passively learn and progress.

Item.name: LCCB Uniform
Item.description: A uniform designed for LCCB, a riot suppression team. It offers good protection against the many threats you may face in a riot and has plenty of pockets.

sprite.name: Security Officer's Uniform 1 Left Lower Arm
Security Officer's Uniform 1 Right Lower Arm
Security Officer's Uniform 1 Left Upper Arm
Security Officer's Uniform 1 Right Upper Arm

Item.name: LCCB Armor Vest
Item.description: A ballistic vest designed primarily for use in riot scenarios.

Item.name: LCCB Helmet (Mask)
Item.description: A riot helmet made to LCCB standards and fitted with a diving mask. When fitted with an oxygen supply, chemical warfare is a non-issue.

Item.name: LCCB Handgun
Item.description: A handgun with twice the capacity of an ordinary revolver. Its toughened frame allows it to make the most of Quake Rounds, but its kick asks a lot of the user.

Item.name: Quake Round
Item.description: A miniaturized shock emitter tuned to inflict Tremor on targets. Repeated shots will quickly build the effect.

Item.name: LCCB Shock Baton
Item.description: An LCCB-issued low-voltage baton tuned to a specific frequency that interacts with the Tremor phenomena and causes muscle paralysis.

Item.name: LCCB Shotgun
Item.description: An LCCB-issued shotgun with a slightly above-average capacity and a specially tuned barrel for hard-hitting shots.

Item.name: Quake Shotgun Shell
Item.description: A shotgun shell which delivers a disrupting payload to anyone unfortunate enough to be on the receiving end.

Item.name: Ahab's Gas-harpoon (Slashing)
Item.description: A sturdy gas-powered spear, whetted to pierce the hearts of whales.

Item.name: Ahab's Gas-harpoon (Throwing)
Item.description: A sturdy metal spear which can be thrown, to explosive ends.

Item.name: K Corp Class 1 Uniform
Item.description: A uniform designed for K Corp's Class 1 security staff. It is particularly well-suited to search and rescue or riot suppression operations.

Item.name: K Corp Class 1 Armor
Item.description: A ballistic vest and shoulder rig which provides above-par protection against environmental hazards.

Item.name: K Corp Class 1 Helmet
Item.description: A helmet made for K Corp Class 1 security units. Includes an auto-injector.

Item.name: K Corp Axe
Item.description: A two handed axe made for K Corp Class 1 security units which inflicts a small amount of Rupture or Fragile on hit. It has an added benefit of being able to hack through ballast flora and quickly break down doors to reach trapped crew.

Item.name: K Corp Shock Baton
Item.description: A K Corp issued low-voltage baton with a similar mechanism to the LCCB Baton, although it trades Paralysis for more Tremor application. Its polycarbonate build allows it to remain lightweight despite its size, but it still weighs more than other batons.

Item.name: K Corp Class 3 Excision Suit
Item.description: An armored suit designed for K Corp's Class 3 Excision Staff. Regeneration Ampule fluid can easily conduct through the suit to regenerate its wearer, if they know how to use it.

Item.name: K Corp Excision Staff
Item.description: A two handed staff made for K Corp Class 3 Excision Units which inflicts Rupture on hit.

Item.name: R Corp 4th Pack Rabbit Uniform
Item.description: A lightweight armored suit designed for R Corp 4th Pack's Rabbit Team.

Item.name: R Corp 4th Pack Rabbit Helmet
Item.description: A helmet made for R Corp 4th Pack Rabbits.

Item.name: R Corp 4th Pack Reindeer Uniform
Item.description: A middleweight armored suit designed for R Corp 4th Pack's Reindeer Team.

Item.name: R Corp 4th Pack Reindeer Helmet (Festive)
Item.description: A helmet made for R Corp 4th Pack Reindeers.

Item.name: R Corp 4th Pack Reindeer Tank
Item.description: A bulky tank capable of carrying ample energy reserves for staves. (In-game though, it LARPs as a backpack.)

Item.name: Cosmetically Hidden Armor Vest Tier I
Item.description: An armor vest designed to be concealed under one's clothing. The use of alloys improves physical protection without costing in the mobility department.

Item.name: Cosmetically Hidden Armor Vest Tier II
Item.description: An armor vest designed to be concealed under one's clothing. The use of alloys improves physical protection without costing in the mobility department.

Item.name: Cosmetically Hidden Armor Vest Tier III
Item.description: An armor vest designed to be concealed under one's clothing. The use of alloys improves physical protection without costing in the mobility department.

Item.name: R Corp 4th Pack Rabbit Knife
Item.description: Graze the grass!

Item.name: R Corp 4th Pack Rabbit Coilgun
Item.description: A shoulder-fired portable coilgun carried by R Corp 4th Pack Rabbits. It offers exceptional firepower for exceptional soldiers. Kicks like a mule if you're unskilled.

Item.name: R Corp Coilgun Clip (Standard)
Item.description: A clip of 30 standard coilgun rounds.

Item.name: R Corp Coilgun Clip (Explosive)
Item.description: A clip of 30 explosive coilgun rounds.

Item.name: R Corp Coilgun Clip (Incendiary)
Item.description: A clip of 30 incendiary coilgun rounds.

Item.name: R Corp Coilgun Clip (Piercing)
Item.description: A clip of 30 piercing coilgun rounds.

Item.name: R Corp Coilgun Clip (Physicorium)
Item.description: A clip of 30 Physicorium coilgun rounds.

Item.name: R Corp 4th Pack Rhino Suit
Item.description: An armored suit designed for R Corp's 4th Pack Rhino Team. These elite soldiers specialize in demolition and heavy weapons. Requires Enkephalin Modules to function.

Item.name: R Corp 4th Pack Rhino Helmet
Item.description: A helmet made for R Corp 4th Pack Rhinos. Includes an auto-injector.

Item.name: R Corp 4th Pack Rhino Warhammer
Item.description: A massive hammer best utilized by the heavily suited 4th Pack Rhinos. It excels at knocking down doors and crushing bones.

Item.name: Rhino Fist
Item.description: A melee weapon for Rhinos. Stronger with Charge.

Item.name: Immolator Implant (Small)
Item.description: An implant distributed to elite units to destroy their gear and body upon death, rendering everything irrecoverable for enemies.

Item.name: Kromer ID Card
Item.description: Identification for Kromer.

Item.name: Inquisitor ID Card
Item.description: Identification for an Inquisitor.

Item.name: Rabbit ID Card
Item.description: Identification for a rabbit.

Item.name: Roland's ID Card
Item.description: Identification for a washed up Grade 9 fixer.

Item.name: Arbiter Identification
Item.description: An Arbiter.

Item.name: Claw Identification
Item.description: The Claw.

Item.name: WARP Teleportation Anchor
Item.description: This item needs to be placed in a submarine and powered so that WARP Recall Devices can teleport to it.

Item.name: WARP Recall Device
Item.description: This handy W Corp recall device allows the user to quickly teleport back to their submarine! The W Corp logo is printed on the back of the device. If you want to teleport again before it's finished charging on its own, insert an Enkephalin module. WARNING: Excessive use may result in unwanted side effects.

Item.name: WARP Retreat Device
Item.description: This handy W Corp recall device allows the user to quickly teleport back to safety. (WARNING: Long range teleports on a personal level are far more dangerous! Recalling will hurt, and recalling while in critical condition may kill you!) ((THIS DELETES YOUR CHARACTER))

Item.name: Teleportation Sickness Pills
Item.description: These W Corp issued Enkephalin pills treat teleportation sickness, a common side effect of using teleportation technology. One dose should deal with one teleportation's worth of sickness.

Item.name: W Corp Machete
Item.description: A very sharp blade primarily issued to W Corp Cleanup Crews for rapid close quarters combat. Insert battery to activate Rupture function. While Overcharged, deal 30% more damage.

Item.name: W Corp Knife
Item.description: A small knife issued to W Corp Cleanup Crews for CQB and utility use. Its low cost makes it a valid backup weapon. Insert battery to activate Rupture function. While overcharged, inflict more Rupture.

Item.name: W Corp Glaive
Item.description: A type of polearm with a one-sided blade on the end, primarily designed to grant the user an extended reach for their cuts. It's a common weapon for W Corp Cleanup Crews given its overall utility and ease of use. Insert battery to activate Rupture function. While overcharged, inflict Paralyze, Offense Down, and Slowed to targets, suppressing their combat abilities.

Item.name: W Corp Axe
Item.description: An axe issued to W Corp Cleanup Crews in case they need to breach locked doors, also makes for a pretty effective weapon too. Insert battery to activate the Rupture function. When Overcharged, inflict Defense Down.

Item.name: W Corp Uniform
Item.description: A uniform designed for W Corp's staff.

Item.name: W Corp Body Armor
Item.description: A ballistic vest which provides good protection against potential hazards.

Item.name: W Corp Hat
Item.description: A nice W Corp hat.

Item.name: W Corp CCA Exoskeleton
Item.description: Extremely heavy armor worn by W Corp agents of Level 4 or higher to 'clean up' significant threats. Although powerful, it restricts the user to using its fists for battle, and it can't be carried without wearing it due to its extreme weight. If its battery runs out, it completely immobilizes the user, and it has no space for storing items. Despite all of this, it can be a gamechanger on the battlefield.

Item.name: W Corp CCA Exoskeleton Gauntlet (Left)
Item.description: A devastating gauntlet attached to the W Corp CCA Exoskeleton.

Item.name: W Corp CCA Exoskeleton Gauntlet (Right)
Item.description: A devastating gauntlet attached to the W Corp CCA Exoskeleton.

Item.name: Grade 9 Fixer's Suit
Item.description: Where's the nearest HamHamPangPang?

Item.name: Perception Blocking Mask
Item.description: This mask can block anyone's perception of the wearer's identity.

Item.name: Zelkova Workshop Mace
Item.description: A weighty one-handed mace from the Zelkova Workshop, boasting good performance versus armor.

Item.name: Zelkova Workshop Axe
Item.description: A one-handed axe from the Zelkova Workshop, boasting high performance versus armor, doors, and ballast flora.

Item.name: Crystal Atalier
Item.description: A sharp one handed blade that seems to be coated in a fine crystalline layer of incendium, allowing it to set enemies alight.

Item.name: Durandal
Item.description: A two-handed longsword with exceptional reach and good all-round utility.

Item.name: Old Boys Workshop Hammer
Item.description: A one-handed hammer which can slightly recover the wielder's vitality when they hit an enemy.

Item.name: Allas Workshop Lance
Item.description: A big lance with fantastic reach and a heavy hit to match.

Item.name: Spear Thruster
Item.description: Pushes the spear forward when used.

Item.name: Wheels Industry Greatsword
Item.description: A huge two-handed blade. Its incredible heft makes it slow to use, but a proper hit will deal massive damage and disorient any target.

Item.name: Ranga Workshop Knife
Item.description: A small combat knife which allows its wielder to move much faster than normal. It is very sturdy and can be used to pry doors open.

Item.name: Ranga Workshop Gauntlets
Item.description: These gauntlets improve the wearer's resistance to damage and insulates them from repair-related injuries, while allowing them to repair devices.

Item.name: Atalier Logic Shotgun
Item.description: A powerful shotgun with unlimited ammunition.

Item.name: Atalier Logic Shotgun Shell
Item.description: A devastating shotgun shell produced by Atalier Workshop, which specializes in ranged weaponry. Each shell is prohibitively expensive but packs a serious punch.

Item.name: Atalier Logic Revolver
Item.description: A handcannon that is intended to be dual wielded by a sufficiently skilled Fixer.

Item.name: Atalier Logic Handcannon Round
Item.description: A devastating handcannon round produced by Atalier Workshop, which specializes in ranged weaponry. Each round is prohibitively expensive but packs a serious punch.

Item.name: Mook Workshop Katana
Item.description: A katana which can be utilized for a surprising ranged attack rather than melee attacks.

Item.name: Degraded Claw Uniform
Item.description: A somewhat convincing replica of the uniforms used by the legendary Claw Units. It's significantly less capable, owing to its far inferior technology. The suit requires pieces of original Corp technology to make use of its Serums.

Item.name: Elite Claw Uniform
Item.description: A uniform belonging to an elite Claw, an agent of the Head.

Item.name: Claw's Grasp (Weapon)
Item.description: The titular weapon used by Claws. Its razor sharp Physicorium blades infused with Enkephalin can cut clean through steel doors like they're butter.

Item.name: Open Claw (Wearable)
Item.description: Changes the appearance of the Claw's metal hand.

Item.name: Zwei Assoc. Zweihander
Item.description: A standard issue zweihander (two-handed sword) issued to Zwei Association members. Performs well in a mixed defense-offense role, but its heft makes it difficult to use for unskilled wielders.

Item.name: Zwei Association Uniform
Item.description: A member of the Zwei Association could be a bodyguard, a patrolman, a police officer, anything that has to do with protection. Their uniform offers great protection, while the jacket helps remain somewhat discreet. Pairs well with undershirt/hidden armor vests and comes with ample pocket space.

Item.name: Wild Hunt Blade
Item.description: A huge and unconventional blade, one that is difficult to wield if you aren't abnormally strong. Who or what made it, and for what purpose, is unknown.

Item.name: Wild Hunt Coffin
Item.description: You'll get stuffed in this coffin too!

Item.name: Damaged Coffin
Item.description: The coffin is no longer usable as a shield due to damage, but it seems to be slowly recovering as long as it's being worn.

Item.name: Broken Coffin
Item.description: Can be broken out of and dropped.

Item.name: Wild Hunt Coat
Item.description: For the Hunt.

Item.name: Heathcliff's Coat
Item.description: For the Hunt.

Item.name: Ally of the Wild Hunt
Item.description: When applied to someone, marks them as an Ally of the Wild Hunt. They will not be attacked by Thralls.

Item.name: Placeholder Helmet
Item.description: Placeholder for resistances.

Item.name: Seven Association Uniform (Green)
Item.description: The Seven Association specializes in gathering intelligence, so their outfits usually help them blend in better with civilians. They still pack a fair bit of protection, and have some deep pockets.

Item.name: Seven Association Uniform (Black)
Item.description: The Seven Association specializes in gathering intelligence, so their outfits usually help them blend in better with civilians. They still pack a fair bit of protection, and have some deep pockets.

Item.name: Seven Association Vest
Item.description: The Seven Association specializes in gathering intelligence. This vest is made with a ballistic weave that protects against weapons that a suspect may have, but is poor against the natural monsters of Europa. Forgoing a coat's arm protection allows for tougher materials to be used in the vest itself and improves weapon handling, but there are less pockets.

Item.name: Seven Association Coat
Item.description: The Seven Association specializes in gathering intelligence. This coat is made with a ballistic weave that protects against weapons that a suspect may have, but is poor against the natural monsters of Europa.

Item.name: Seven Association Sword
Item.description: A standard issue blade of Seven Association South. It's well-balanced and precise, enabling the user to more easily strike at precise points on their target.

Item.name: Seven Association Revolver Round
Item.description: A revolver round manufactured by the Seven Association for use by its operatives. Its special payload allows it to deal bonus damage and effects to enemy weakpoints and cripple limbs.

Item.name: Seven Association Rifle Round
Item.description: A rifle round manufactured by the Seven Association for use by its operatives. Its special payload allows it to deal bonus damage to enemy weakpoints and cripple limbs.

Item.name: Forensics Data
Item.description: A useful tidbit of information, pertinent to a case. Use this in your Health HUD to gain some experience.

Item.name: Cosmetically Hidden Backpack
Item.description: This special backpack cannot be seen when worn. Good for fashion.

Item.name: Portable Enkephalin Generator
Item.description: A small generator powered by Enkephalin. Inefficient, but it works as a good backup.

Item.name: Vergilius's Suit
Item.description: It's time for your consultation.

Item.name: Vergilius
Item.description: Look to your guide to show the path.

Item.name: EGO of the Red Gaze
Item.description: I simply could not permit this sight to exist any longer. Even if it meant I must swim against the flow.

Item.name: Vergilius's Gladius
Item.description: A superheated blade custom-made for The Red Gaze.

Item.name: Red Gaze's Bloodspear
Item.description: A long spear made of solidified blood, which can be thrown.

Item.name: Red Gaze's Bloodshards
Item.description: A deadly spray of hardened blood which will shred through lightly armored foes with ease and saturate areas with projectiles.

Item.name: Red Gaze's Bloodbomb
Item.description: An orb of compressed blood. Once it loses cohesion, it'll explode violently, similarly to a fragmentation grenade.

Item.name: Curse-Engraved Blade
Item.description: A curse-engraved greatsword wielded by Heishou Pack Mao Branch members. It derives its power from Q Corp's Singularity. It's quite unconventional and often catches unaware enemies off-guard.

Item.name: Heishou Pack Mao Branch Robes
Item.description: These robes are comfortable and well designed, they're loose around most areas allowing full movement and they're wrapped tight around the shins and forearms to improve handling and speed. Due to prioritizing comfort, intrinsically they're not highly protective, but allow room for specialized armor.

Item.name: Heishou Pack Mao Branch Bamboo Hat
Item.description: This unassuming hat grants high protection as the extra material of the hat is actually highly reinforced and protects surprisingly well against projectiles without feeling cumbersome.

Item.name: Heishou Pack Mao Branch Hidden Armor
Item.description: An improvement on the standard hidden armor design, this one is extended under Heishou robes to protect the upper legs and arms from harm.

Item.name: Zilu's Curse-Engraved Blade
Item.description: Using high quality materials, the curse-engraved greatsword can be made thinner and lighter without sacrificing battle performance.

Item.name: Tianjiu Star Blade
Item.description: An exotic blade densely imbued with Q Corp's Curses, requiring it to be contained within its sheathe even while in use. It seems only a sufficiently skilled user could unsheathe it.

Item.name: Mao Branch: Zilu's Robes
Item.description: Improved Mao Branch-styled robes worn by Zilu, the Adept Hare. Physicorium fibers take a terribly long time to weave, but the result is extraordinarily resistant clothing. Enkephalin infusion further empowers the outfit.

Item.name: Mao Branch: Zilu's Bamboo Hat
Item.description: An enhanced Mao Branch-styled hat worn by Zilu, the Adept Hare.

Item.name: Curse-Engraved Polearm (Slashing)
Item.description: A curse-engraved polearm wielded by Heishou Pack Si Branch members. It's highly versatile and offers different attack angles.

Item.name: Curse-Engraved Polearm (Thrusting)
Item.description: A big lance with fantastic reach and a heavy hit to match.

Item.name: Heishou Pack Si Branch Robes
Item.description: These robes are comfortable and well designed, they're loose around most areas allowing full movement and they're wrapped tight around the shins and forearms to improve handling and speed. Due to prioritizing comfort, intrinsically they're not highly protective, but allow room for specialized armor.

Item.name: Heishou Pack Si Branch Bamboo Hat
Item.description: This unassuming hat grants high protection as the extra material of the hat is actually highly reinforced and protects surprisingly well against projectiles without feeling cumbersome.

Item.name: Heishou Pack Si Branch Armor
Item.description: Rather than hiding their additional armor underneath roomy robes, the Si Branch add more garments on top instead.

Item.name: Atalier Logic Rifle Round
Item.description: A devastating rifle round produced by Atalier Workshop. Each round is prohibitively expensive but packs a serious punch.

Item.name: N/A
Item.description: There don't seem to be any ingredients for this category yet...

Item.name: Blade Lineage Salsu's Dopo Robe
Item.description: The Blade Lineage is a Syndicate that has a noted lack of structure, with its members acting much more independently than those in other Syndicates. It accepts any who have nowhere else to go and have the murderous intent necessary to survive in such a group. The members take pride in the scars they receive in battles, seeing a lack of scars as proof of cowardice in battle.

Item.name: Blade Lineage Mentor's Dopo Robe
Item.description: I expect that turmoil shall visit us soon. I have been tasked with the role of a protector, so I shall do my duty to the bitter end. ...Yet I foresee that my fellows, the one I must protect, and I may lose my place at S Corp.

Item.name: Blade Lineage Bamboo Hat
Item.description: This unassuming hat grants high protection as the extra material of the hat is actually highly reinforced and protects surprisingly well against projectiles without feeling cumbersome.

Item.name: Blade Lineage Sword
Item.description: A blade that has seen many battles.

Item.name: Blade Lineage Scabbard
Item.description: Actually a backpack, cosmetically a scabbard.

Item.name: Reinforced Tuxedo
Item.description: Want to look dapper without missing out on protection? We've got you covered.

Item.name: Kurokumo Uniform
Item.description: The Kurokumo Clan is one of the twenty subsidiaries of The Thumb. It is notable for its focus on swordplay, and is recognizable by their extensive augmentation tattoos, which depict the black clouds they are named after.

Item.name: Kurokumo Clan Coat
Item.description: Although it has the texture of silk, make no mistake, these fibers can resist bullets.

Item.name: Kurokumo Clan Coat (Rolled Sleeves)
Item.description: Roll up your sleeves and get to work.

Item.name: Kurokumo Henchman Sword
Item.description: A blade belonging to a henchman of the Kurokumo Clan.

Item.name: Kurokumo Wakashu Sword
Item.description: A blade belonging to a Wakashu of the Kurokumo Clan.

Item.name: Kokuunto (Gold)
Item.description: A Kurokumo Clan Captain's blade. The name translates to Dark Cloud Blade.

Item.name: Kokuunto (Black)
Item.description: A Kurokumo Clan Captain's blade. The name translates to Dark Cloud Blade.

Item.name: Kurokumo Scabbard (Type 1)
Item.description: Actually a backpack, cosmetically a scabbard.

Item.name: Kurokumo Scabbard (Type 2)
Item.description: Actually a backpack, cosmetically a scabbard.

Item.name: Tarnished Land of Illusion
Item.description: A mighty effloresced E.G.O. weapon to be wielded by the Lord of Hongyuan.

Item.name: Érlì
Item.description: A mighty effloresced E.G.O. weapon to be wielded by the Jade Qilin.

Item.name: Jade Qilin's Robes
Item.description: Durable robes worn by the Jade Qilin. Physicorium fibers take a terribly long time to weave, but the result is extraordinarily resistant clothing. Enkephalin infusion further empowers the outfit.

sprite.name: Jade Qilin Uniform Left Lower Arm
Jade Qilin Uniform Right Lower Arm
Jade Qilin Uniform Left Upper Arm
Jade Qilin Uniform Right Upper Arm

Item.name: Jade Qilin Hidden Armor
Item.description: An improvement on the standard hidden armor design, this one is extended under robes to protect the upper legs and arms from harm.

Item.name: Jia Qiu's Hair
Item.description: A convincing wig that copies Jia Qiu's iconic hairstyle.

Item.name: Jia Baoyu's Hair
Item.description: A convincing wig that copies Jia Baoyu's iconic hairstyle.

Item.name: Cut them down, Mao
Item.description: Commands the Mao Branch to attack the target.

Item.name: Heed me, Zilu
Item.description: Commands Zilu to attack the target.

Item.name: Like a Roaring Storm
Item.description: Commands the Mao Branch to attack multiple targets in front of you.

Item.name: Heishou Pack You Branch Robes
Item.description: These robes are comfortable and well designed, they're loose around most areas allowing full movement and they're wrapped tight around the shins and forearms to improve handling and speed. Due to prioritizing comfort, intrinsically they're not highly protective, but allow room for specialized armor. You branch modifications improve fireproofing but reduce stun protection.

Item.name: Heishou Pack You Branch Bamboo Hat
Item.description: This unassuming hat grants high protection as the extra material of the hat is actually highly reinforced and protects surprisingly well against projectiles without feeling cumbersome. You branch modifications improve fireproofing but reduce stun protection.

Item.name: Heishou Pack You Branch Hidden Armor
Item.description: An improvement on the standard hidden armor design, this one is extended under Heishou robes to protect the upper legs and arms from harm. You branch modifications improve fireproofing but reduce stun protection.

Item.name: Heishou Pack You Branch Scabbard
Item.description: Actually a backpack, cosmetically a scabbard.

Item.name: Xueyan Blade
Item.description: The Heishou Pack: You Branch primarily uses this weapon in battle. It possesses the ability to set targets alight and can inflict a fair amount of bleeding as well.

Item.name: Bloodflame Sword
Item.description: Bloodflame Swords are wielded by the Heishou Pack: You Branch. Its name is not just for flair, as it's laced with a chemical that allows it to ignite the blood of enemies. In other words, striking bleeding targets will set them on fire.

Item.name: Heishou Pack Wu Branch Robes
Item.description: These robes are comfortable and well designed, they're loose around most areas allowing full movement and they're wrapped tight around the shins and forearms to improve handling and speed. Due to prioritizing comfort, intrinsically they're not highly protective, but allow room for specialized armor. Wu branch modifications improve fireproofing but reduce stun protection.

Item.name: Heishou Pack Wu Branch Bamboo Hat
Item.description: This unassuming hat grants high protection as the extra material of the hat is actually highly reinforced and protects surprisingly well against projectiles without feeling cumbersome. Wu branch modifications improve protection.

Item.name: Heishou Pack Wu Branch Hidden Armor
Item.description: An improvement on the standard hidden armor design, this one is extended under Heishou robes to protect the upper legs and arms from harm. Wu branch modifications improve stun protection.

Item.name: Heishou Pack Wu Branch Polearm
Item.description: A powerful steel guandao wielded by members of the Wu Branch. Inflicts Tremor on targets.

Item.name: Firefist Office Uniform
Item.description: Fixers of Firefist Office, hailing from the district of P. Corp, wear red pinstripe suits, carry a tank of fuel on their back, and fight with a power gauntlet with an attached flamethrower, giving them their eponymous Firefist name.

Item.name: Firefist Mask
Item.description: A slim mask which covers the face and acts as a respirator, preventing inhalation of toxic fumes that may be produced by flames.

Item.name: Firefist Fuel Tank
Item.description: A bulky tank capable of carrying ample fuel reserves for flamethrowers. (In-game though, it LARPs as a backpack.)

Item.name: Firefist Power Gauntlet
Item.description: A melee weapon for the Firefist Office.

Item.name: Firefist Flamethrower
Item.description: A compact flamethrower meant for use by the Firefist Office. It can accept both oxygen and welding fuel tanks, but the flamer mode cannot start fires and won't work underwater.

Item.name: N Corp Kleinhammer Uniform
Item.description: A well-insulated uniform intended for the N Corp Inquisition's Kleinhammers, providing ample protection against battle damage.

Item.name: N Corp Kleinhammer Armor Vest
Item.description: A steel vest, heavy but very durable.

Item.name: N Corp Kleinhammer Helmet
Item.description: An antique-styled helmet that is surprisingly effective in the modern era, with enough enhancements of course.

Item.name: N Corp Mittelhammer I Armor
Item.description: Although its durability improvements are marginal, adding some high quality armor plates to the shoulders and knees is an effective way to improve survivability without impeding movement too much more.

Item.name: N Corp Mittelhammer I Helmet
Item.description: Modest improvements to the Kleinhammer design, sure, but it does come with a visor that's easier to see through.

Item.name: N Corp Mittelhammer II Helmet
Item.description: Physicorium plating enables the Mittelhammer II helmet to be significantly more durable while reducing the weight of the armor itself, and the saved space inside has been replaced with watertight breathing gear. When paired with the Mittelhammer II suit, provides 6000m of pressure protection.

Item.name: N Corp Mittelhammer II Armor
Item.description: A heavy suit of armor built for N Corp's most elite of Mittelhammers, warriors second only to the Großhammer. (Note: The armor grants an additional defense bonus to the torso, upper arms, waist and thighs, making it more protective than the listed stats here.)

Item.name: N Corp Großhammer Helmet
Item.description: A top of the line helmet constructed exclusively for use by the Großhammer of the N Corp Inquisition. Aside from being highly protective, it also consumes oxygen much slower than standard oxygen masks.

Item.name: N Corp Großhammer Armor
Item.description: A custom-made suit of armor built for the Inquisition's second in command, the Großhammer. When worn with its helmet counterpart, it grants 10000m of pressure resistance. (Note: The armor grants an additional defense bonus to the torso, upper arms, waist and thighs, making it more protective than the listed stats here.)

Item.name: Shi Association East Uniform
Item.description: Rain pelts awake hearts, Alleyways puddle with steps; The rest is silence.

Item.name: Shi Association East Quiver
Item.description: Actually a backpack, cosmetically a quiver.

Item.name: Shi Association East Bowblade (Melee)
Item.description: A bowblade given to members of the Shi Association's East Section.

Item.name: Bowblade Arrow (Standard)
Item.description: A sturdy arrow for the Shi East Bowblade. Expensive, but powerful, and can be retrieved.

Item.name: Bowblade Arrow (Physicorium)
Item.description: A highly advanced arrow for the Shi East Bowblade. Using Physicorium lightens yet reinforces the arrow, allowing it to fly straighter and pierce armor more effectively, at the cost of causing less bleeding on the target. It's also capable of piercing a wall or window and will still deal full damage if a skillful headshot is landed on the target beyond.

Item.name: Bowblade Arrow (Sedative)
Item.description: A sedative-tipped arrow for the Shi East Bowblade. Deals significantly less damage than standard arrows, with the obvious tradeoff of being able to knock out targets that you fail to kill. Assuming they don't have stun resistance of course, but if you land a headshot you'll guarantee a takedown.

Item.name: Index Proselyte Uniform
Item.description: The Index makes up one of the five Fingers, massive syndicates with power rivalling national governments. Of the Fingers, they stand out for their fatalistic and dogmatic beliefs, centered around following mysterious, seemingly random tasks delivered to them known as the Prescripts.

Item.name: Index Proselyte Cloak
Item.description: A nice cloak for carrying out Prescripts. Trades storage space for protection.

Item.name: Index Proxy Cloak
Item.description: A nice cloak for carrying out Prescripts. Trades storage space for protection.

Item.name: Index Proselyte Mask
Item.description: A blindfold that protects the wearer's face from injuries.

Item.name: Index Proxy Mask
Item.description: A steel mask that protects the wearer's mouth from injuries. Also functions as a diving mask.

Item.name: Index Proselyte Sword
Item.description: A standard issue blade for Index Proselytes. Attacks inflict Fragility, making sustained damage on a single target more effective.

Item.name: Index Proselyte Scabbard
Item.description: Actually a backpack, cosmetically a scabbard.

Item.name: Dawn Office Uniform
Item.description: Dawn Office is a small but wealthy Grade 4 Office and an associate Office of the Liu Association. Run by Salvador, a veteran Fixer, the Office is located in V Corp. (Note: At high Psychosis and while under the effects of an E.G.O. Stabilizer, summons unique armor and grants Waxen Pinion.)

Item.name: Effloresced E.G.O.: Waxen Pinion's Armor
Item.description: I’ll end this fight for sure this time.

Item.name: Stigma Workshop Sword
Item.description: A sword produced by Stigma Workshop, which specializes in weapons that burn the enemy. They're also known for the unique wavy patterns on their blades which are burned into the enemy as a calling card. Swings with this weapon lower your sanity while you have Indelible Stigma. Its parry isn't refreshed by augmented skill for some reason...

Item.name: The Last Knight Helmet
Item.description: A helmet reminiscent of long lost glory.

Item.name: The Last Knight Armor
Item.description: Slay the Ocean, Slay the Ocean!!! Grants improved speed in water and an additional 75% protection for the chest and upper limbs.

Item.name: The Last Knight's Lance
Item.description: A big lance with fantastic reach and a heavy hit to match.

Item.name: The Last Knight's Lance (Propulsion)
Item.description: A big lance with fantastic reach and a heavy hit to match.

Item.name: T Corp Tuxedo
Item.description: Formal attire commonly worn by T Corp.'s employees, constructed out of ballistic weave for added protection.

Item.name: T Corp Watch
Item.description: Essentially a cosmetically hidden backpack that also allows you to interface with Borrowed Time mechanics. How to use: Set an amount of seconds, up to 30, with which you want to borrow time. Time will be taken from your 'Accumulated Time' affliction first, but if you try to Borrow Time otherwise, you'll accrue a deficit. While having a deficit, you cannot borrow additional time and you will suffer from Lost Time equal to the amount of Borrowed Time you benefitted from. While you have Lost Time, you cannot Borrow Time.

Item.name: T Corp Tax Collector Class 2 Armor
Item.description: T Corp's Time Tax collectors are often attacked during collection duties. For this reason, ample protection is required. (The torso has an additional 75% protection on top of what is listed here.)

Item.name: T Corp Tax Collector Class 2 Hat
Item.description: A top hat and gear which protect the user's head from harm. Just avoid short doorways.

Item.name: T Corp Exoskeleton Gauntlet (Left)
Item.description: Between Borrowed Time and their gauntleted fists, Class 2 Tax Collectors have few options to defend themselves, though they are terrifyingly effective nonetheless. The left hand is capable of prying open locked doors. (Both of these benefit from the Multifunctional talent.)

Item.name: T Corp Exoskeleton Gauntlet (Right)
Item.description: Between Borrowed Time and their gauntleted fists, Class 2 Tax Collectors have few options to defend themselves, though they are terrifyingly effective nonetheless. The right hand is capable of carrying out basic mechanical repairs. (Both of these benefit from the Multifunctional talent.)

Item.name: T Corp Tax Collector Class 3 Armor
Item.description: Class 3 Tax Collectors are commonly sent to apprehend wealthier Time Tax evaders. Their stronger armor and greater reserve of Borrowed Time allows them to counteract whatever traps such individuals could afford. (The torso has an additional 75% protection on top of what is listed here.)

Item.name: T Corp. Tax Collector Class 3 Helmet
Item.description: When worn with the Class 3 armor, provides pressure protection.

Item.name: T Corp Tax Collector Class 3 Pickaxe
Item.description: A huge pickaxe capable of siphoning time from struck targets, proving quite useful in taking down Time Tax evaders.

Item.name: T Corp Tax Collector Class 3 Chainsaw
Item.description: A high-powered chainsaw for close quarters battle with Time Tax Defaulters.

Item.name: T Corp Class 3 VDCU Tuxedo
Item.description: The Violent Defaulter Collections Unit specializes in taking down organized, violent crime related to Time.

Item.name: T Corp Class 3 VDCU Armor
Item.description: Many of T Corp's Tax Collectors are skilled in quickly attaching their armor prior to combat using a brief burst of Borrowed Time, but the VDCU can go even further and attach or detach their armor at will, seemingly manifesting it from thin air. Although less protective than simply wearing it at all times, this affords a higher range of movement. (The torso has an additional 75% protection on top of what is listed here.)

Item.name: T Corp Class 3 VDCU Hat
Item.description: A top hat and gear which protect the user's head from harm. Just avoid short doorways.

Item.name: T Corp VDCU Collections Mace
Item.description: A transforming mace with a hefty blow to it, capable of easily knocking foes off-balance.

Item.name: T Corp. Time Collection Beam
Item.description: A tool that collects Time and doesn't do much else.

Item.name: T Corp. Time Collection Beam Battery
Item.description: Powers the T Corp Time Collection Beam. Otherwise works like a normal battery.

Item.name: Night Awls Stiletto
Item.description: A sturdy stiletto blade made for precise strikes. Although small, the blade is durable and offers a good grip for parrying, if the user is skilled enough.

Item.name: Night Awls Uniform
Item.description: The Night Awls were a Syndicate operating as a subsidiary of the Thumb, at least until their hot-headed Captain angered a Sottocapo, an act which triggered a purge of the entire subsidiary Syndicate.

Item.name: Night Awls Coat
Item.description: The fate of the Night Awls, to be purged by the Thumb, is rather ironic. They were once the Purge Enforcers of the Thumb.

Item.name: Night Awls Prosthetics
Item.description: Serving under the Thumb means stepping out of line carries a price, often paid in limbs. (Functions as a cosmetically hidden backpack.)

Item.name: Jeong's Office Rep Uniform
Item.description: Jeong's Office is a subsidiary of the Oufi Association which most often oversees gambling matches and games. It is the job of Offices like these to verify the results of games and prevent cheating or violence from sore losers.

Item.name: Jeong's Office Rep Sword
Item.description: This blade allows for switching between three Card Suits: Pine Crane (Red), Susuki Grass (Yellow), and Blue Sakura (Blue). Each Suit grants bonus damage effects: Bleed, Tremor, and Offense Down respectively.

Item.name: Jeong's Office Rep Scabbard
Item.description: Whenever a game happens with something at stake, a go-between needs to be there to prove that the results were legitimate. (Actually a backpack, cosmetically a scabbard.)

Item.name: Devyat Association Uniform
Item.description: The Devyat' Association primarily specializes in the delivery of items, with the Association being known for being able to 'deliver to any place in the world.' This outfit includes a lightweight exoframe that can run off an internal battery and boost the user's movement speed.

Item.name: Devyat Association Goggles (T1)
Item.description: Simple, rugged goggles. They can be upgraded with scanners as needed.

Item.name: Devyat Association Goggles (T2: Health)
Item.description: An improvement to the goggles' design increases resilience and adds a Health Scanner HUD.

Item.name: Devyat Association Goggles (T3: Thermal)
Item.description: A further improvement to the goggles' design increases resilience again and adds thermals.

Item.name: Devyat Courier Trunk [Hammer]
Item.description: This configuration of the Courier Trunk allows it to deliver powerful downward swings. ((!!WARNING: CHANGING MODE WILL DROP THE TRUNK'S CONTENTS!!)) The Devyat' Association Fixers uniformly carry Association-issued delivery trunks called 'Courier Trunks', which utilizes technology that allows them to store much larger objects than their outside volume would allow, while not increasing in weight in any significant capacity. These Courier Trunks also function as Devyat' Fixers' weapons, being able to transform into various shapes and produce a wide variety of gadgets, in addition to emitting 'decay particles' and 'decay energy' Courier Trunks are also provided with weak assistant-level AIs named 'Poludnitsa'.

Item.name: Devyat Courier Trunk [Piston]
Item.description: This configuration of the Courier Trunk allows it to deliver powerful pneumatic strikes capable of disorienting foes. ((!!WARNING: CHANGING MODE WILL DROP THE TRUNK'S CONTENTS!!)) The Devyat' Association Fixers uniformly carry Association-issued delivery trunks called 'Courier Trunks', which utilizes technology that allows them to store much larger objects than their outside volume would allow, while not increasing in weight in any significant capacity. These Courier Trunks also function as Devyat' Fixers' weapons, being able to transform into various shapes and produce a wide variety of gadgets, in addition to emitting 'decay particles' and 'decay energy' Courier Trunks are also provided with weak assistant-level AIs named 'Poludnitsa'.

Item.name: Devyat Courier Trunk [Blade]
Item.description: This configuration of the Courier Trunk allows it to deliver powerful slashes. ((!!WARNING: CHANGING MODE WILL DROP THE TRUNK'S CONTENTS!!)) The Devyat' Association Fixers uniformly carry Association-issued delivery trunks called 'Courier Trunks', which utilizes technology that allows them to store much larger objects than their outside volume would allow, while not increasing in weight in any significant capacity. These Courier Trunks also function as Devyat' Fixers' weapons, being able to transform into various shapes and produce a wide variety of gadgets, in addition to emitting 'decay particles' and 'decay energy' Courier Trunks are also provided with weak assistant-level AIs named 'Poludnitsa'.

Item.name: Bloodfiend Manager Attire
Item.description: Accumulate 20% more Bloodfeast.

Item.name: Bloodfiend Prince Attire
Item.description: Slowly heals damage if you have 50+ Bloodfeast.

Item.name: Bloodfiend Prince Hardblood Armor
Item.description: I am the prince of the parade! Grants gradual healing of bloodloss.

Item.name: Bloodfiend Prince Hardblood Helmet
Item.description: Grants short range thermal vision if you have over 100 Bloodfeast.

Item.name: Bloodfiend of Prayers Attire
Item.description: Slowly heals psychosis while you have 50+ Bloodfeast.

Item.name: Bloodfiend of Prayers Mask
Item.description: Functions as a medical scanner.

Item.name: Bloodfiend Priest Attire
Item.description: Did you think about blood today? Heals Bleeding while you have 100+ Bloodfeast.

Item.name: Bloodfiend Priest Mask
Item.description: Functions as a health scanner and recovers sanity at 50+ Bloodfeast.

Item.name: Bloodfiend Fashionista Attire
Item.description: Boosts movement speed by 10% at 50+ Bloodfeast.

Item.name: Bloodfiend Fashionista Mask
Item.description: Very fashionable!

Item.name: Bloodfiend Barber Attire
Item.description: I'll sew you a new dress! Move 15% faster at 50+ Bloodfeast.

Item.name: Bloodfiend Barber Mask
Item.description: We've an event for you! +10 Weapons Skill and 10% more ranged attack speed.

Item.name: Corrupted Blood
Item.description: A pack of blood that seems to be tainted with some kind of disease. Turns the subject into a Bloodfiend if administered successfully, failure will cause rapid full-body necrosis.

Item.name: Corrupted Blood of Prayers
Item.description: A pack of blood that seems to be tainted with some kind of disease. Grants a talent relevant to the Staff of Prayers, failure will cause rapid full-body necrosis.

Item.name: Corrupted Blood of Fashion
Item.description: A pack of blood that seems to be tainted with some kind of disease. Grants a talent relevant to the Fashionista Scissors, failure will cause rapid full-body necrosis.

Item.name: Fencing Manual
Item.description: Teaches you how to block, parry, and dodge.

Item.name: R Corp 4th Pack Reindeer Staff
Item.description: A staff that focuses the brainwaves of its user to fire bolts of energy at targets.
